alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:58PM CDT until August 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern Grant County in west central Nebraska... Northeastern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 458 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, or 28 miles north of Oshkosh, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jerry Lake, Bourquim Hill and Britton Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
